languages.text: "Как прикажете, Ваша Светлость. Я не повторяю чужие слова, лишь сообщаю, что они звучат. Но ваше повеление будет исполнено".

traits.locale_text: "Как прикажете, Ваша милость. Я не повторяю чужие слова, лишь сообщаю, что они звучат. Но ваше повеление будет исполнено".

languages.text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете, Ваша Светлость. Я не повторяю чужие слова, лишь сообщаю, что они звучат. Но ваше повеление будет исполнено".

traits.locale_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."
"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."
"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."
"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."
"As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

languages.text: 「陛下の仰せのままに。私は他者の言葉を繰り返しているのではなく、ただ、それらが語られている事実を陛下にお伝えしているだけにございます。しかし、陛下の命令とあらば適切に実行いたします」
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の仰せのままに。私は他者の言葉を繰り返しているのではなく、ただ、それらが語られている事実を陛下にお伝えしているだけにございます。しかし、陛下の命令とあらば適切に実行いたします」

languages.text: “遵命，大人。我并不是在重复别人的话，我只是在告诉您，有人在说这些谎话。不过，我会按您的吩咐照去做。”
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。我并不是在重复别人的话，我只是在告诉您，有人在说这些谎话。不过，我会按您的吩咐照去做。”

languages.text: «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}. No pretendía repetir palabras ajenas; solo informarle de que están circulando. Cumpliré de buena gana su sanción».
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}. No pretendía repetir palabras ajenas; solo informarle de que están circulando. Cumpliré de buena gana su sanción».

languages.text: « Si tel est votre souhait, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne répétais pas les mots d'un autre, je me contentais de vous informer qu'ils étaient prononcés, mais il en sera fait selon votre volonté. »
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: « Si tel est votre souhait, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne répétais pas les mots d'un autre, je me contentais de vous informer qu'ils étaient prononcés, mais il en sera fait selon votre volonté. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wiederhole aber nicht die Worte eines anderen, sondern informiere Euch lediglich, dass sie kursieren. Aber Eurem Geheiß wird entsprochen."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wiederhole aber nicht die Worte eines anderen, sondern informiere Euch lediglich, dass sie kursieren. Aber Eurem Geheiß wird entsprochen."

languages.text: "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Başkalarının laflarını tekrarlamıyorum, sadece bu laflar ağza alınıyor diye haber veriyorum. Yine de nasıl emrederseniz öyle olsun."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am not repeating the words of another, merely informing you that they are being spoken. But your behest will be carried out."

traits.locale_text: "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Başkalarının laflarını tekrarlamıyorum; sadece bu laflar ağza alınıyor diye haber veriyorum. Yine de nasıl emrederseniz öyle olsun."
